Key Match Events: Corey Seager launched a two-run homer into the right-field seats
Adolis García cut down Christian Walker at the plate with a stellar throw from right field
Seager started a clutch double play, sliding on his knees to field a hot smash from Ketel Marte before flipping to Marcus Semien at second, who threw to first
Jon Gray, Josh Sborz, Aroldis Chapman and José Leclerc combined to keep Arizona’s offense quiet
Miscellaneous Highlights: Corey Seager’s two-run homer was the hardest-hit Fall Classic homer in the Statcast era, dating back to 2015
Texas overcame injuries to Scherzer and Adolis García in improving to 9-0 on the road this postseason
The two teams combined for no errors over the first two games of the series
Walker led off the second with a double and Tommy Pham followed with a single, but Walker was thrown out at home
Scherzer gave up no runs on two hits and two walks while striking out one
